title: The Sire de Maletroits Door dialogue juxtaposition

content.question: In the final paragraph, the only spoken words in the passage highlight a juxtaposition between

choices.label: Malétroit’s polite invitation and his threatening appearance
Malétroit’s refined manner and his use of dialect
Denis’ rude behavior and his host’s gentle nature
Denis’ high expectations and his bitter disappointment

content.answer: Malétroit’s polite invitation and his threatening appearance

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
